install.name: PHP File inclusion Module
install.author: Bernhard Wehinger
install.description: This module provides a simple way to include a custom PHP script into a Joomla module.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: Suffix to append to the CSS class attribute of this module.

param.name: suppress_errors
param.label: Suppress errors
param.description: Select whether to display if there have been troubles including the php file

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
